thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: As ‘Mifid’ Regulations Roll Out, Bond Volumes Fall

author: Christopher Whittall
title: As ‘Mifid’ Regulations Roll Out, Bond Volumes Fall
text:
Trading in some bonds fell sharply in Europe on Wednesday as banks implemented the massive set of new finance regulations known as Mifid II.
The falloff was largely expected, given the volume of trading data that now needs to be recorded makes Mifid II a huge technology challenge for banks.
The Markets in Financial Instruments Directive II...
